name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Detail-oriented Senior Electrical Engineer with 9+ years of experience in the design, development, and implementation of high-voltage substations and T&D systems. Proficient in **AutoCAD**, **MicroStation**, and **Bentley Substation** for substation physical design, grounding systems, bus design, and conduit/cable routing. Expertise in relay coordination, SCADA interfaces, and protection & control design while adhering to NESC and IEEE standards. Demonstrated project leadership with strong mentoring abilities and a collaborative approach to cross-discipline coordination, ensuring tailored solutions for complex electrical engineering challenges.
